subject: Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Harris Mansell scored 15 points — including the go-ahead basket in the final minute — to give Rider a 61-57 victory at Rutgers on Friday night.
snippet: Harris Mansell scored 15 points — including the go-ahead basket in the final minute — to give Rider a 61-57 victory at Rutgers on Friday night.
